column2: "Welcome back! Hmm... It seems like a lot of people are worried about chocolate."

"You heard something from Stratos...?
Wait a minute, I'm Stratos... What's going on here?!"
"I'm the embodiment of Stratos's wishes... I get it now! So that's why I don't remember how I got here."
"In other words, I'm the embodiment of her desire to be a strong Hero who can help everyone!"
"Alright, I'm fired up now! I'm going to fulfil my mission and be the Hero everyone needs!"
